title: IObit Smart Defrag Pro 5.0.2.768 Multilanguage + Key [SadeemPC]
description:

It helps defragment your hard drive more efficiently than any other product on the market â€“ free or not. It is known that disk fragments has been a primary cause of slow and unstable PC performance.

IObit Smart Defrag is such a FREE tool that provides extremely fast and efficient defragmentation to your hard drives intelligently for faster file loading and high disk performance. With â€œinstall it and forget itâ€ feature, the program works automatically and quietly in the background on your PC, keeping your hard disk running at its top speed.

If you are a gamer, then Smart Defrag is right up your alley. Smart Defrag also has a useful tool called Game Defrag. You can manually add games, so they are defragged separately from your storage drive defrag process
